channel.title: Nooby Question
channel.description:
Set up my server on buttik.org
and got the essentials plugin, however i cant build when im admin/mod/builder/op! I've changed the build to true and everything. Is there anyother reason?
I've been playing minecraft for 2 days. Please excuse my "noobyness"

item.title: Nooby Question
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

You have to use bukkit
And try traveling out of spawn and build then, if that does work something is wrong with the ranks of op etc.

Read full topic
